title: School Facilities and Student Participation in Timor-Leste

choices: Coastal areas have the best facilities

questions.question: What is a key benefit of engaging local communities in school infrastructure development?
choices: Increased sense of ownership and responsibility
questions.answer: Increased sense of ownership and responsibility

choices: Logistical difficulties in reaching remote areas
